dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 4092 IH: To reauthorize the sound recording and film preservation programs of the Library of Congress, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Brady of Pennsylvania introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on House Administration, and in addition to the Committee on the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To reauthorize the sound recording and film preservation programs of the Library of Congress, and for other purposes.

subsection.text: Section 133 of the National Recording Preservation Act of 2000 (2 U.S.C. 1743) is amended by striking through fiscal year 2016 and inserting through fiscal year 2026.

paragraph.text: Section 152411(a) of title 36, United States Code, is amended by striking through fiscal year 2016 an amount not to exceed and inserting through fiscal year 2026 an amount not to exceed the lesser of $1,000,000 or.

paragraph.header: Number of members of Board of Directors
paragraph.text: Section 152403(b)(2) of such title is amendedâ€”

subparagraph.text: in subparagraph (A), by striking nine directors and inserting 12 directors; and
in subparagraph (C), by striking six directors each place it appears and inserting 8 directors.

subsection.text: Section 112 of the National Film Preservation Act of 1996 (2 U.S.C. 179v) is amended by striking through fiscal year 2016 and inserting through fiscal year 2026.
Section 151711(a)(1)(C) of title 36, United States Code, is amended by striking through 2016 and inserting through 2026.
